mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.product_no , p.type_no , p.product_name , p.price , i.upload_name , AVG(r.rating) AS avg_score , COUNT(r.rating) AS review_count , p.created_at FROM product p JOIN images i ON i.reference_code = p.reference_code JOIN product_spec po ON po.product_no = p.product_no LEFT JOIN review r ON r.product_no = p.product_no WHERE p.type_no = #{ typeNo } GROUP BY p.product_no , p.type_no , p.product_name , p.price , i.upload_name , p.created_at LIMIT 4
